tool_description: Generates random unique quotes or random unique jokes with each API call
name: Random Quote Generator
title: Random Quote Generator

api_list.name: Random Joke
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote-generator8.p.rapidapi.com/random-joke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote-generator8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://random-quote-generator8.p.rapidapi.com/random-joke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
